mapper.select: select count(*) from drug where drug_name like #{keyword}
SELECT sale.sale_id as saleId, sale_name as saleName from drug INNER JOIN drug_sale on drug.drug_id=drug_sale.drug_id INNER JOIN sale on sale.sale_id=drug_sale.sale_id where drug.drug_id=#{drugId}
mapper.insert: insert into drug(drug_name, drug_info, drug_effect, drug_img, publisher) VALUES (#{drugName},#{drugInfo},#{drugEffect},#{drugImg},#{publisher})
